actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to exempt inflatable boats and rafts used for carrying passengers from the provisions of the coastwise laws requiring vessels to be built in the United States.

summary.text: Exempts inflatable boats and rafts used for carrying passengers for hire from the provisions of the coastwise laws requiring vessels to be built in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to exempt inflatable boats and rafts used for carrying passengers from the provisions of the coastwise laws requiring vessels to be built in the United States.
